item.title: devTech #1: My First Post
item.description: I started this site for several reasons.

item.title: devTech #2: First Session Summary, Study Plan, Certificates
item.description: My first session - A Summary I aim to become a well rounded developer, knowledgeable in multiple fields of development, however, I aim to specialise in front-end development, therefore, I figured it only made sense to begin here. I have started from the basics, including how the internet works, the history and the technology behind it. I am currently completing a 14.5 Hour Udemy course that delivers a deep dive into HTML & CSS.
